value.title: Anthony Levandowski Gets 18 Months in Prison for Stealing Google Self-Driving Car Files

Last year, Musk announced Tesla’s plan to deploy 1 million “Robotaxi” vehicles for a self-driving ride-sharing network by the end of 2020.
